description: React component 'LessonPlayer' renders a video element with autoplay, controls, and styling. It attempts to autoplay video when the 'src' prop changes.

methods.name: LessonPlayer({ src, poster })
methods.description: Functional React component that renders a video element with given source and poster, auto-plays video on source change.

ctags.name: ref
ctags.pattern: /^    <video ref={ref} src={src} poster={poster} muted playsInline controls style={{ width: '100%'/

fields.name: <video ref={ref} src={src} poster={poster} muted playsInline controls style={{ width: '100%'/
